casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antwarn Lee ROGERS 63A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2017 Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, Wyatt B. Orsbon, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Rogers, Antwarn Lee. Heather H. Freeman, Assistant Attorney General, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 7th of June 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 19th day of July 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
